Description: Ostracon, fragment from the body of a drab-coloured pottery wine-jar, interior and exterior slightly grooved, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and with traces of a black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393101) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393101)
